content: pussywillow mitts size one size fits average woman materials one skein of koigu painter s palette premium merino 50g/175yd one skein of lace weight mohair with equal yardage suggested yarns rowan kidsilk haze lana grossa silkhair lang mohair luxe size 5 double pointed needles or your preferred needle type for working small circumference in the round or size to get gauge stitch holder for thumb stitches yarn needle to weave in ends gauge 24 stitches & 34 row = 4 note these mitts are made with one strand of the koigu and one strand of the mohair held together throughout directions cast on 40 stitches and divide over 3 double-pointed needles join being careful not to twist and begin pattern row 1 k3 p1 repeat around row 2 knit repeat these two row for a total of 25 row you should end having just knit a row 1 begin thumb increases knit next row until there are 3 stitches remaining before the end of round pm m1r k1 m1l pm knit to end __________________________________________________________________________________________ 381 salmon brook street granby ct 06035 860 653-9700 www marjisyarncrafts com this pattern was written by marji lafreniere exclusively for marji s yarncrafts this pattern is not for use by others to make items for sale and not to be copied without permission keeping in pattern as previously established work increases every other row this is every row 2 of pattern knitting all stitches in between markers and keeping the rest of the mitt in pattern stitch knit to marker slip m m1r knit to marker m1l slip marker knit to end when there are 15 stitches between markers work one more row in pattern on the following row when you get to the first marker remove marker and slip the 15 thumb stitches onto a stitch holder remove next marker cast on 1 stitch using the backwards loop method and finish round continue in pattern for another 19 row end having just worked a row 1 bind off in knit or in purl if you want a ridge at the top thumb go back and slip the thumb stitches onto 3 needles join yarn and knit around picking up 2 stitches in the edge where you cast on the stitch knit for a total of 10 row bind off in knit or in purl sew in ends and make another one abbreviations k=knit p=purl k2tog= knit 2 together pm= place marker kf&b= increase by knitting into the front & back of stitch ssk= slip 2 sts one at a time as if to knit insert left needle into fronts of these 2 sts from left to right and k2tog in this position y/o= yarn over bring yarn in between and then over right hand needle ws= wrong side rs= right side bor=beg of round m1l= with left needle pick up bar between st just worked and next st on left needle from front to back and knit through the back m1r= with left needle
